entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is a werewolf who was forced to gaze up at the woman and bared his pointed teeth.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape sent the sword to the woman's vault in Gringotts.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a location where the woman has a vault.

entities.name: woman
entities.description: The woman is holding a sword and brandishing it in Greyback's face.

relationships.description: Snape sent the sword to the woman's vault in Gringotts, which was found by Greyback.
The woman has a vault in Gringotts where Snape sent the sword.
